name.en: Mission Design, Space Propulsion and Spacecraft Architecture
name.ch: 推進與太空載具架構太空任務設計應用

department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch:
太空任務架構、太空推進以及太空載具架構有高度的關聯性，而且特別是在新太空商業化時代日益重要。因為以上任務都有大幅的速度變換需求，推進系統的選擇攸關太空任務的成功以及太空載具的架構。

本課程將以實際範例來呈現太空任務的開發，並且會特別著重於太空推進的應用。本課程將強調如何以正式系統工程的方法來進行太空任務開發，並會從任務目標推導對應的需求及正確的取捨評估。
goal.en:
The three disciplines of a) mission architecture b) space propulsion and c) spacecraft
architecture are very closely interlinked. Particularly in the context of exploration missions, which are becoming increasingly important during the commercialization of the new space age. The choice of propulsion system is decisive for the success of the mission and the spacecraft’sarchitecture is very much determined by the propulsion system as all these missions feature a high delta-v demand. The course will use case studies to illustrate the process of mission
development with a focus on space propulsion. Emphasis will be placed on the formal systems engineering approach, where the derivation of requirements based on mission objectives and the correct execution of trade-offs will be central.

outline.ch:
1.背景與導論。
2.內太陽系的資源與應用規劃。
3.推進系統種類與基礎。
4.基礎軌道運動學。
5.任務設計範例：月球。
6.任務設計範例：火星。
7.任務設計範例：小行星帶。
8.化學推進 I – 加速度與功率需求。
9.化學推進 II – 燃燒學與能量來源。
10.電動推進 I -加速度與功率需求。
11.電動推進 II – 電源與設計。
12.推進燃料管理系統 I – 低推力。
13.推進燃料管理系統 II – 高推力。
14.推進燃料儲存與設計考量。
15.分組活動 – 月球與火星任務構想。
16.分組活動 – 小行星帶任務構想。
outline.en:
1. Introduction and overview
2. Resources and utilization plans of the inner solar system
3. Taxonomy and fundamentals of propulsion systems
4. Basics of orbital dynamics
5. Mission design – example Moon
6. Mission design – example Mars
7. Mission design – example Asteroid Belt
8. Chemical propulsion I – acceleration principle and power requirements
9. Chemical propulsion II – combustion theory and energy sources
10. Electric propulsion I – acceleration principle and power requirements
11. Electric propulsion II – power sources and design
12. Propellant management system I – low thrust
13. Propellant management system II – high thrust
14. Propellant storage and design considerations
15. Conceptual design of Moon ＆ Mars mission – collaborative work
16. Conceptual design of an asteroid belt mission – collaborative work
